attributes.action: Stop increasing maths grade boundaries by a ridiculous amount
attributes.background: I have failed my maths as the grade boundaries have increased by 37 marks. This has resulted in very upset students and angry teachers. Stop changing the boundaries.

rejection.details:
Grade boundaries aren't decided by the Government or Parliament. They are set by exam boards.

You can find out more here:

https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/gcse-and-a-level-exams-how-marking-and-grading-works
